item.title: What Are Yubikeys Used For?
item.description: What Exactly Are Yubikeys, And How Do You Use Them? Yubico is a brand of security keys that provide physical two-factor authentication. The YubiKey is a hardware two-factor authentication device. The YubiKey is intended to ensure that the owner of the device, not the device, is the one that logs into the account. Each key is unique and can be used to access your online accounts as well as secure sensitive data.
